main event: A citizen in Los Angeles, California reported observing round, white objects the size of a baseball rapidly disappearing into the haze on the horizon for approximately 6 seconds.
interesting points: The observed objects were described as round, white, and the size of a baseball, disappearing into the horizon rapidly.
The sighting lasted for approximately 6 seconds, and the objects were observed to be engulfed in the haze.
The report mentioned that all characteristics of the sighting resembled those of a meteor, with insufficient data for proper evaluation.
The sighting was made using ground visual observation with no binoculars involved.
The report was part of Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force program that investigated unidentified flying objects (UFOs).
